 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקַל‎</span>] **verb**. ==bend, twist== (Late Hebrew especially in derivatives; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] in derivatives; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***twist***, in derived species; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind*** camel's folded fore-shank and arm ***together***); — 

**Pu\`al** ***be bent out of shape, crooked, Participle*** figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁפּט מְעֻקָּל‎</span> [[Hab.1.4|Hab 1:4]] ***crooked justice***.
